name: @cynos/core
description: Cynos - High-performance in-memory database for JavaScript/TypeScript
author: Saviio

scripts.sync:wasm: cp wasm/cynos_database.d.ts src/wasm.d.ts && sed 's/cynos_database_bg\.wasm/cynos.wasm/g' wasm/cynos_database.js > src/wasm.js && cp src/wasm.js dist/wasm.js && cp wasm/cynos_database.d.ts dist/wasm.d.ts && cp wasm/cynos_database_bg.wasm dist/cynos.wasm
scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && sleep 3 && pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run sync:wasm
scripts.build:benchmark: pnpm run build:wasm:benchmark && pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run sync:wasm
